title: Global blurred + dimmed backdrops for modals and sheets

requirements.summary: Apply a consistent global blur + dim backdrop for Radix/Shadcn overlays (Dialog/Sheet) so background content is de-emphasized while overlay content stays sharp.
acceptanceCriteria: When ProfileSetupModal is open, the entire app content behind it is visibly dimmed and blurred (not just darkened).
When the mobile navigation Sheet is open (hamburger menu), the entire app content behind it is visibly dimmed and blurred.
Backdrop styling is applied globally (via CSS overrides/theme), without editing files under frontend/src/components/ui (immutable).
Overlay blur/dim does not blur the modal/sheet content itselfâ€”only the background behind the overlay.

file_operations.description: Add global CSS overrides targeting Radix overlay elements (Dialog/Sheet) to apply backdrop-filter blur and a dimmed background color (using !important where necessary to override existing overlay classes) so only the page behind the overlay is blurred/dimmed while modal/sheet content remains unblurred.
